name: Jellyon Wars
description:
A game with a tower defense approach, play as a space marine shooting monsters. Defeat a variety of creature waves, upgrade accordingly to be able to survive  further into greater levels.

Player does not move, only shoots at the closes enemy it finds. Cointains up to 39  stages  with 4 mini bosses in between, after each round, game saves automatically and can be retaken later on. 

Game varies from:
* 25 to 35 minutes: Easy mode

There is a hard mode only accesible after normal mode is completed, which removes the saving option and makes the game have only one life and no continues, it adds and extra layer of challenge and success rate depends on a lot of factors, including "Luck".


Controls:
* Mouse left click

Operative system:
* Windows
